eas_text: A civil authority has issued A REQUIRED WEEKLY TEST for the following counties or areas: Rhode Island; Bristol; Kent; Newport; Providence; Washington, RI; at 01:01 PM ON DEC 15, 2025 Effective until 02:01 PM. Message from WSLF/CAP.
extra_text: Rhode Island EMA:  Required Weekly Test of the EAS system via IPAWS.
